text:
@JustinWolfers @WSJ That's maybe because @NYGovCuomo and DeBlasio were telling people to go on with their lives, ride the subway or attend parades and shuffled #coronavirus patients into nursing homes where the most vulnerable population in the city all lived.

And yet you'll blame @realDonaldTrump.
